weekly_top_story.headline: Venezuela's Military Announces 24 Security Officers Were Killed in U.S. Attack
weekly_top_story.summary: A U.S. military raid resulted in the abduction of Venezuelan President Nicolas Maduro, killing dozens and sparking a fierce crackdown by interim leaders, raising fears of regional instability and escalation of U.S. interventionism in Latin America.

stories.headline: U.S. Pledged Security Guarantees to Ukraine at Paris Summit with European Allies
stories.summary: Ukraine received binding security commitments from the U.S. and European allies, including potential troop deployments post-ceasefire, bolstering defenses against Russia but risking prolonged tensions in Europe.

stories.headline: Over Two Dozen Protesters Killed in Iran Amid Economic Crisis and U.S. Sanctions
stories.summary: Iranian protests over economic collapse have led to at least 34 deaths and thousands arrested, with U.S. officials encouraging dissent, potentially destabilizing the regime and affecting global energy markets.
